content: We have homeless lemmas in that PR, see this commit. They need algebra.group_with_zero.power and filter.tendsto but no normed stuff. I felt it was wrong to import algebra.group_with_zero.power into order.filter.at_top_bot but maybe I'm wrong. @Sebastien Gouezel @Yury G. Kudryashov
It would be nice to decide this soon because that PR already has a long history. And by the way it would be nice if some other maintainer could have a look since I contributed some code there.
